summary: SECOND FAILURE OF  2002 CHRYSLER SEBRING CONVERTIBLE AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT .  MY WIFE HAD A HEAD -ON COLLISION OF LEFT FENDER WHILE TURNING. THE AIRBAG DID NOT DEPLOY. THIS IS A  THE SECOND TIME  OF AN  ACCIDENT AND THE AIRBAG DID NOT DEPLOY.  MY WIFE SUFFERED A  SEVERE CONCUSSION AGAIN FROM THE STEERING WHEEL ALTHOUGH SHE WAS WEARING A SEAT BELT. IS THERE A SEBRING AIR BAG PROBLEM SIMILAR TO THE CHRYSLER MINI-VAN DEPLOYMENT. CAR IS CURRENTLY LOCATED AT DEALER UNDERGOING REPAIRS.   *NLM
